app_details.title: Equity Mobile
app_details.description: Equity mobile has revolutionised digital banking. This app gives you complete control of your financial and lifestyle needs. Simply view your balances, pay your bills, buy airtime, send money and so much more, all from one convenient platform. With Equity mobile, you will be able to: Conveniently and securely do your banking - Open a bank account in an instant - Create your profile from the comfort of your home at any time - Have a full view of your accounts, balances and transactions - Download account statements and transaction receipts - Lost your card? Block it temporarily Grow - Borrow with ease - View and pay your loan balances Transact on the go Send money - To your own or other Equity accounts - To other banks, locally or internationally - To mobile money - To your prepaid or credit card(s) Pay with Equity - Pay your bills - Buy goods - Pay to an M-PESA till Buy airtime Save people and businesses to your list of favourites Quick and easy access - Sign-in with fingerprint or facial recognition - Change the app to your preferred language (we support English, French, Kinyarwanda, Swahili and 中文) - Day or night, manage your money with Dark Mode support
app_details.descriptionHTML:
Equity mobile has revolutionised digital banking. This app gives you complete control of your financial and lifestyle needs. Simply view your balances, pay your bills, buy airtime, send money and so much more, all from one convenient platform.

With Equity mobile, you will be able to:

Conveniently and securely do your banking
- Open a bank account in an instant
- Create your profile from the comfort of your home at any time
- Have a full view of your accounts, balances and transactions
- Download account statements and transaction receipts
- Lost your card? Block it temporarily

Grow
- Borrow with ease
- View and pay your loan balances

Transact on the go
Send money
- To your own or other Equity accounts
- To other banks, locally or internationally
- To mobile money
- To your prepaid or credit card(s)

Pay with Equity
- Pay your bills
- Buy goods
- Pay to an M-PESA till

Buy airtime
Save people and businesses to your list of favourites

Quick and easy access
- Sign-in with fingerprint or facial recognition
- Change the app to your preferred language (we support English, French, Kinyarwanda, Swahili and 中文)
- Day or night, manage your money with Dark Mode support

content.4: easy to use to all users
content.14: Equity Mobile App offers seamless control over your finances and lifestyle. Instantly view balances, pay bills, buy airtime, and send money with ease. The app features quick account opening, secure transactions, and user-friendly navigation, making banking simple and efficient. Perfect for managing personal finances on the go, Equity Mobile ensures convenience, speed, and security in one powerful app. Highly recommended for smart banking anytime, anywhere.
content.18: Why i'm I missing some money?
content.21: This app is easy to use but mine is not working I have even tried to update it still not opening
content.27: first and reliable but the transaction cost is bit hefty man
content.31: very nice bank app to use
content.36: thank you for settling my issues
content.37: What happened to your one month loan, ever showing me messages that I have arrears loan.
content.39: it's so nice app, I'm using fantastic
content.43: Equity bank has the best services .
content.46: best app ever, I enjoy your service
content.48: Best reliable bank for a common Kenyan Citizen.
content.50: check on how you follow people who have your debts, not every day message even if the due date is not yet
content.53: the transaction fee is too high
content.56: equity bank leads and others follow

content.59: Very useful app. here's Feedback on areas of review/improvement 1. Biometrics Fails to authenticate after app update 2. All loans that require document uploads have an error .... "Could not get a successful response during upload docs request"
content.61: why can't it help me to enter my account it keeps telling me that it is not working for me while i have active bank accountbi use daily
content.68: Super and quick though it may work abnormally sometimes
content.69: not able to send money to others
content.75: app okay make it secure completely people fear using it due to increased cyber crime
content.79: Icl its speed and accuracy is top🏦🏧💯📍 Get yourself an Equity Bank Acc/App... It's amazing.🔥🔥🍖❤️... Very Efficient. Easy Banking with24/7 assistance from their ChatBOT.🤖
content.85: What's happening!? the new update completely broke the app. For two days now I haven't been able to access my account. The amount of payments I couldn't make have piled up. you really need to fix this asap
content.86: Am trying to open the app but it's refusing..please help,am running out of my patience am having problems logging in and transacting,,
content.87: every other equity app on Google playstore installs except this one
content.88: I was just logged in , it logged me out and upon logging in the fingerprint feature was gone 😕😞. I was just done with a transaction but I have not received any confirmation. so unrealiable
content.110: nice app i love it. i can monitor my account and do all transfers at the comfort of my house
content.117: I would like a way to directly communicate with corporate people regarding products
content.118: it's responds faster and easier to use for payment
content.122: The User Interface is superb. Kindly check on the button which suggests ' I'd like to leave'. Its not exiting the user from the app, rather its redirecting the user back in. Check on it. Otherwise superb job.
content.125: the bank you will want to have
content.128: cool but you don't offer good loans
content.131: equity mobile banking is the best
content.137: i like the way it works 💪
content.140: new update had a problem. the sms confirmation never works and the alternatives don't load.
content.150: it's easy to save with equity
content.152: The app has been messing me whenever I want to transact especially on Sundays.I end up uninstalling and installing again after failing to update itself and then again I have to visit nearest branch for the app to be unblocked.. kindly check on that!
content.158: Transactions are restricted to the registered number only, and transfers to other bank accounts (your account) are not allowed.
content.159: Poor, because now you can't manage favorites like earlier before!
content.161: Easy, reliable and secured. nice experience.
content.172: I love equity it has save me many times sometimes when am broke i just apply loan and it gives me instantly
content.176: instant services...zero wait time for any service.....
content.183: I am very disappointed with the customer care service at Equity Bank. The response time is extremely slow, and when assistance is finally given, it is often unhelpful or unclear. Issues are not followed up properly, and customers are left waiting without solutions. A bank of this level should prioritize professionalism, efficiency, and respect for customers. I hope Equity Bank takes serious steps to improve its customer support services
content.184: its very useful app..thax equity ....l recommend it you..you lacking sth good 👍
content.185: the best affordable app...I enjoy using it
content.186: hello tech support.,, just installed the app and I've been having issues..otp is generated but I can't key it in so it ends up expiring every time..any help
content.188: services are always available and are commendable
content.193: This app is absolute rubbish if i could give 0 stars i'd most certainly give it to this app
